sticky-image-description: Get the top news from across Pennsylvania, plus some fun and a puzzle, all in one free daily email newsletter.
support-hed: ... We have a small favor to ask
support-text: No one covers Pennsylvania like Spotlight PA. We're independent, with no corporate owner or profit motives. We’re nonpartisan, with no political agenda or opinion pieces. And we're a nonprofit, allowing us to prioritize investigative and public-service journalism that gets results. While many newsrooms are cutting back, laying off, or shutting down, we are uncovering stories no one else is telling, investing in our communities, and driving real change. Your support is urgently needed to ensure it can continue. Will you help power our next big story? Christopher Baxter CEO/President, Spotlight PA PS: If you prefer to mail a check, you can send it to: Spotlight PA, PO Box 11728, Harrisburg, PA 17108-1728
takeover-dek: Independent, nonpartisan, no-nonsense reporting urgently needs your support. Give to Spotlight PA today & get your contribution TRIPLED »
topper-image-description: Support unmatched election and investigative reporting for Pennsylvania.
